channel.title: CVE Feed for Kubernetes -- aws-iam-authenticator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kubernetes -- aws-iam-authenticator

item.title: CVE-2022-2385|2024-09-16T22:25:39.286Z -- kubernetes -- aws-iam-authenticator
item.description: A security issue was discovered in aws-iam-authenticator where an allow-listed IAM identity may be able to modify their username and escalate privileges.
